room_title: Escape room "Oceans Royale" by The Lock Houston in Houston
review: This place was so fun! We were in the Casino room and we made it through in 59:64.

room_title: Escape room "Oceans Royale" by The Lock Houston in Houston
review: I've been to another escape room before and it was lame in comparison to The Lock! We did Oceans Royale, it is multi-room and so cool! The clues weren't too hard and the tricks that they had were top of the line. We got to crawl through lasers! How fun is that!

room_title: Escape room "Oceans Royale" by The Lock Houston in Houston
review: We had a lot of fun doing the Casino room. We had a large family so it was great that it was so accommodating for our group size. The only downside is that the rules were a little confusing about having to walkie-talkie before we could type passwords in, in case it would lock up after too many tries. It left us feeling like we didn't solve anything on our own. It was a fun family day but it wasn't a 10. Very nice staff, thanks so much!
